name: FORMS (Amit Etkes, Roi Shacham, Guy Mizrachi)
name_original: FORMS (Amit Etkes, Roi Shacham, Guy Mizrachi)
description:
Take a journey into the our sketch base world of colors and forms,

Jump, roll and moan while you understand what's the best form of yourself to solve this puzzle, entertaining our always changing world.

take a zoom in or out, get connected to your inner child  and just have FUN!

 - For best experience play with Sony playstation controller and sound on  -

Scribble,  doodle and drawn by:

Amit Etkes, Roi Shacham, Rinat Lantsman &  Guy Mizrachi

With the help and Guidance of:

Eran Hilleli, Gideon Rimmer, Doron Assayas Terre

Created as part of a Digital Game course at the  Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design, 2023

Music by:

Duval Timothy, Nala Sinephro & Andy Stott
